Text: Coral Dragon
A fearsome hunter of the deep sea, intensified by Luna's magic. With a honed physique, it releases a single strike of water that transforms into a blade.\n
Deals large P.DMG to the first four characters in the front, moderately lowering their P.ATK. Additionally, slightly increases TP for all allies.\n
Deals medium M.DMG to a small frontal area and greatly decreases TP.\n
Deals medium P.DMG to a small area centered around the second character from the back, greatly lowering M.ATK.\n
A gigantic golem covered in the crystallization of Luna's magic. The crystals adorning it serve as sturdy shields and become spears that pierce through everything.\n
When the Crystal Golem receives poison, venom, curse, or burn effects, its action speed greatly decreases.\n
Removes all debuff effects on itself and greatly increases P.DEF and M.DEF. Additionally, moderately increases P.DEF and M.DEF for all allies except itself.\n
Deals medium P.DMG to all enemies, inflicting stun.\n
Deals large P.DMG to enemies within a frontal area, slightly increases the P.ATK and allies' M.ATK, and moderately recovers its own TP.\n
Crystal Golem
A sea creature rampaging in Luna's tower. Once a servant of the ancient sea god, now reduced to a purposeless destroyer.\n
Deals M.DMG to all enemies.\n
Deploys a field in a certain range that decreases P.ATK and M.DEF and inflicts continuous M.DMG.\n
Deals large M.DMG to the second and third characters from the front.\n
Rampaging Sea Beast
A clown from the demon world scheming to make Luna's Tower its stage. It manipulates the lives of the audience with a cheerful smile and madness.\n
Deals large M.DMG to all enemies and inflicts darkness status.\n
Deals random small P.DMG to one character six times, then deals large P.DMG to all enemies. This attack becomes more accurate against characters in the front row.\n

Summons a timed bomb in a medium range in front. The bomb explodes after 8 seconds, dealing medium P.DMG to all enemies within its range. However, if the bomb's HP drops below 1% before exploding, it deals P.DMG equal to 15% of Mad Clown's maximum HP.\n
Mad Clown
An ancient weapon running amok with Luna's Tower's magic. The power of ancient guardians has transformed into a curse-spreading catastrophe.\n
Deals large P.DMG to all enemies and greatly decreases its own P.DEF and M.DEF.\n
Deals medium P.DMG to all enemies within a range centered around one character in the front, moderately lowering their P.DEF. Additionally, inflicts stun.\n
Deals medium P.DMG to all enemies and inflicts curse status. If a character's HP is below 40%, curse damage is doubled.\n
A giant bird that has come flying seeking Luna's magic. It wields a petrifying cursed sword, accompanied by its fledglings.\n
Deals large M.DMG to all non-petrified characters and petrifies them briefly. Deals damage equal to 80% of maximum HP to all petrified characters.\n
Deals small M.DMG to the first three characters from the front. Additionally, petrifies characters afflicted with poison for a long duration.\n
Deals medium M.DMG to characters within a frontal area and inflicts poison status. If its own HP is below 50%, knocks back all enemies and summons a Cuckoo.\n

The Cuckoo deals small P.DMG to the character with the highest P.ATK within a frontal area and inflicts poison status. When its own HP drops below 35% of maximum HP, it moderately increases TP for the ally with the highest P.ATK and becomes incapacitated.\n
A mysterious creature that consumes the magic of Luna's Tower and continues to proliferate. It crushes everything indiscriminately.\n
Deals large P.DMG to all enemies and additionally decreases P.DEF.\n
Deals P.DMG to enemies within a frontal area, greatly decreases the P.ATK of the two characters with the highest P.ATK, and further decreases their TP. Greatly decreases its own P.DEF.\n
Deals P.DMG to the first three characters from the front and moderately increases its own P.ATK.\n
A giant lizard mutated by Luna's magic. Its hard spike-like scales chip away at the enemy's health and armor.\n
Deals large P.DMG to all enemies and further decreases their TP.\n
Deals P.DMG to the first three characters from the front, deals large P.DMG to the frontmost character, and decreases their P.DEF and M.DEF.\n
Iwanozuchi
Deals large P.DMG to all enemies and further decreases the P.ATK of P.ATKers. Damage is increased by 1.8x against enemies with burn status.\n
A creature from another realm that appeared in search of Luna's magic. It plans to conquer Luna's Tower with its magic eye and followers.\n
Deals large M.DMG to all enemies and additionally decreases their M.DEF.\n
Deals random small M.DMG to one character six times.\n
Deals medium M.DMG and inflicts long-term restraint on the third character from the back. Additionally, deals small M.DMG to all enemies.\n
Lord Evilly
A ferocious magical beast mutated by Luna's magic. Its strong fangs easily tear apart even seasoned adventurers.\n
Union Burst: Deals large P.DMG to all enemies and restores its own HP.\n
Deals P.DMG to enemies within a rear area and inflicts stun. Additionally, decreases the P.DEF of all enemies.\n
Deals P.DMG to the first three characters from the front and inflicts poison status.\n
A heavily modified human awakened by Luna's magic. The maximum output of the small reactor is enough to electrocute itself.\n
Deals large P.DMG to the first three characters from the front and inflicts paralysis. Cancels its own status enhancement effects and decreases P.DEF and M.DEF.\n
